Song.title: Take Me In
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Clayton Brooks © 2010 Presence Publishing (Admin. by The Oaks Fellowship)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [||: Dm | Bb | F | C :|| OR ||: D | Bb | F | C :||]
Verse 1: [Dm] I am a sinner who’s been washed clean [Bb] I am a captive who’s been set free. [F] I've been forgiven by the King of grace And [C]Oh! the joy when I see your face
Verse 2: [Dm] You made a way where there was none [Bb] Purchased my name with the blood of your son [F] I’m welcomed in to the courts of your throne And [C] Oh! the joy that floods my soul
Chorus: [Dm]Oh the joy that f[Bb]loods my soul When I’m [F]with you Lord When I’m [C]with you Lord [(Repeat)]
Bridge: [Dm]By your blood I’m red[Bb]eemed By your mercy I am [F]free You’ve forgiven every [C]sin In your love you take me [Dm]in To your heart to your th[Bb]rone That I may know you and be k[F]nown So I come in confi[C]dence in your love you take me [Dm]in. [(Repeat or to Tag)]
Tag: Take me [Bb]in Take me [F]in [C]Oh In your love you take me [Dm]in [(Repeat tag or to ___)]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i am a sinner whos been washed clean i am a captive whos been set free ive been forgiven by the king of grace and oh the joy when i see your face verse 2 you made a way where there was none purchased my name with the blood of your son im welcomed in to the courts of your throne and oh the joy that floods my soul chorus oh the joy that floods my soul when im with you lord when im with you lord bridge by your blood im redeemed by your mercy i am free youve forgiven every sin in your love you take me in to your heart to your throne that i may know you and be known so i come in confidence in your love you take me in tag take me in take me in oh in your love you take me in
